trans-unit.source: Declares permissions for loading types from assemblies that are used by a XAML reader or writer.
trans-unit.target: Deklaruje uprawnienia podczas ładowania typów z zestawów, które są używane przez XAML odczytywania lub zapisywania.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is relevant for scenarios such as whether internal types are permitted to load under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> ma zastosowanie w przypadku scenariuszy, takich jak czy wewnętrzne typy są dozwolone można załadować w częściowej relacji zaufania.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> klasy.

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of specific <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Wyliczalny zestaw określonych <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> wartości.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class, using an enumerable set of specific <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> przy użyciu wyliczalny zestaw określonych <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> wartości.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with each `allowedAccess` entry as an item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje połączenie do tego konstruktora <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> kolekcji z poszczególnymi `allowedAccess` wpis jako element i ustawia zwrotu dla <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> do `false` w utworzone wystąpienie.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> jest <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> contained invalid information, such as a null item.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> zawiera nieprawidłowe informacje, takie jak elementu o wartości null.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> wartości wyliczenia.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class, using existing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> przy użyciu istniejących uprawnień.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `true` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> Ustawia zwrotu dla <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> do `true` w utworzone wystąpienie.

trans-unit.source: Any call to this constructor sets the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection to `null` because it is not relevant if permissions are being reported rather than <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Aby jakiekolwiek odwołania do tego konstruktora ustawia <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> kolekcji `null` ponieważ nie jest istotne, jeśli uprawnienia są zgłaszane zamiast <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.

trans-unit.source: The defining <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Definiowanie <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> wartość.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class, using a single <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> przy użyciu pojedynczego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> wartość.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with `allowedAccess` as the only item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje połączenie do tego konstruktora <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> kolekcji z `allowedAccess` jako jedynym elementem i ustawia zwrotu dla <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> do `false` w utworzone wystąpienie.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> jest <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of all <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values that this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera listę wszystkich <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> wartości tego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> reprezentuje.

trans-unit.source: A read-only list of <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Lista tylko do odczytu do <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> wartości, lub <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is initialized such that <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> may be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli bieżący <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> została zainicjowana tak, aby <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> jest `true`, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> może być `null`.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy i zwraca identyczne kopię bieżącego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Kopię bieżącego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: Per the interface contract of <xref:System.Security.IPermission> this value is <xref:System.Security.IPermission> in the signature but can be cast to <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.
trans-unit.target: Na umowie interfejsu <xref:System.Security.IPermission> ta wartość jest <xref:System.Security.IPermission> w sygnaturze, ale mogą być rzutowane na <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: Kodowanie XML na potrzeby rekonstrukcji obiektu zabezpieczeń.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruuje obiektu zabezpieczeń o określonym stanie kodowania XML.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elem" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elem" /> jest <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elem" /> does not contain the XML encoding for a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elem" /> nie ma kodowania XML dla <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: —lub—

trans-unit.source: The version attribute within <paramref name="elem" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Atrybut version w <paramref name="elem" /> nie jest obsługiwane.

trans-unit.source: The specific <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> to check for.
trans-unit.target: Konkretnym <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> do wyszukania.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> includes a specified <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> in its <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" /> list.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca czy to <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> obejmuje określonej <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> w jego <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" /> listy.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> exists as an item in the <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" /> list of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Jeśli <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> istnieje jako element <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" /> listę bieżących <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: W przeciwnym razie <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> ma wartość null.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> to intersect with the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> do intersect z bieżącym <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Może być <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> that is the intersection of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy i zwraca <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> czyli przecięcie bieżącego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> i określonego uprawnienia.

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Nowe uprawnienia, które reprezentuje część wspólną bieżącego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> i określonego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Jest to nowe uprawnienie <see langword="null" /> Jeśli część wspólną jest pusta.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Dla operatora union, intersect i logiki podzestawu <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> zaznaczono najpierw i może zwrócić wyniku wyłącznie na sprawdzanie.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Następnie <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> jest zaznaczony.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> or is not a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> nie jest <see langword="null" /> lub nie jest <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: Uprawnienia, które ma być sprawdzane pod kątem relacji podzbioru.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Może być <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Określa, czy bieżący <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> jest podzbiorem określonego uprawnienia.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Jeśli bieżący <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> jest podzbiorem określonego uprawnienia; w przeciwnym razie <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Dla operatora union, intersect i logiki podzestawu <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> zaznaczono najpierw i może zwrócić wyniku wyłącznie na sprawdzanie.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Następnie <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> jest zaznaczony.

trans-unit.source: If `target` is `null` and the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is both <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` and has an empty <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> list, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli `target` jest `null` i obecnie <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> jest zarówno <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` i ma pustą <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> listy, ta metoda zwraca `true`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> or is not a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> nie jest <see langword="null" /> lub nie jest <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca czy to <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> Określa nieograniczone uprawnienia.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Jeśli ta <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> Określa nieograniczone uprawnienia.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> has specific access level restrictions in <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" />, or has no permissions.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> Jeśli <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> ma ograniczenia dotyczące poziomów dostępu określonych w <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" />, lub nie ma uprawnień.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy kodowania XML tego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> i swojego bieżącego stanu.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: Kodowanie XML tego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />, łącznie z żadnych informacji o stanie.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> to combine with the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> połączenie z bieżącym <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Może być <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy uprawnienia, które jest Unii bieżącego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> i określonego uprawnienia.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> that represents the union of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Nowy <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> reprezentujący Unii bieżącego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> i określonego <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Dla operatora union, intersect i logiki podzestawu <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> zaznaczono najpierw i może zwrócić wyniku wyłącznie na sprawdzanie.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Następnie <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> jest zaznaczony.

trans-unit.source: If `other` is `null`, the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli `other` jest `null`, bieżący <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> jest zwracany.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="other" /> is not <see langword="null" /> or is not a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="other" /> nie jest <see langword="null" /> lub nie jest <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
